oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Allen, George S., 1827 September 23
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of George S. Allen, dated September 23rd, 1827. Illustrates the first page of the document. Allen’s will was “Recorded in Book 16, Pages 204, 205, 206” in the Davidson County Court. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allen family
